review: I got the Fire Stick instead of buying a antenna for an extra tv. I must say my children do enjoy this device and so do I. I am able to limit television watching by simply taking out the stick. I think it is a great device.
author: Lisa

review: Simple to install.  Easy to use and with Amazon Prime plus the many other Apps it is an entertainment goldmine.
author: Harry J. Martin

review: Great device. Better than I expected. I'm hoping Prime add more movies that are included in the membership!
author: Stan Howard

review: Can not get the channels I should get
author: sharon moore

review: It usually works when non one else in the home is using the internet.
author: Loretta

review: not to many shows i enjoy, plus it went on sale$...right after i got mine...it`s probably a real good thing for some,but i most likely wont use it much

review: Good product. Easy to set up and use. Loving it!!!
author: George Davis

review: I love my Fire TV Stick. It is so much easier to use than Chromecast. My favorite part is that it comes with a remote making changing programs so much easier!
author: LJ Scott "LJ Scott"
